players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I'm shocked that Alice was killed. We need to discuss and share suspicions to find the mafioso."
You: "I'm shocked that Alice is gone so early. We should all share our thoughts and vote wisely to catch the mafioso."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and discovered he is the mafioso. We need to vote him out immediately."
Charlie: "Bob is definitely the mafioso - I investigated him last night as the detective. Diana, we need to vote together to eliminate him and win this game."
You: "I think Charlie is lying to frame me as the mafioso. He's probably the real threat here – let's vote him out instead!"
